price: 50. Waxay odhan: Miyeyna Rusushiinnii idiinla iman Xujooyin cad? Waxay odhan: Haah, Waxay odhan: Marka barya idinku. Baryada gaaladuna ma aha waxaan aheyn mid ku dhacda meel baadi ah.
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَوَلَمۡ تَكُ تَأۡتِيكُمۡ رُسُلُكُم بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِۖ قَالُواْ بَلَىٰۚ قَالُواْ فَٱدۡعُواْۗ وَمَا دُعَٰٓؤُاْ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَٰلٍ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qālū awalam taku tatīkum rusulukum bil-bayināti qālū balā qālū fa-id'ʿū wamā duʿāu al-kāfirīna illā fī ḍalālin
